name: Paradox (itch) (Wahooney)
description:
Escape the secret lab by creating and using tears, paradoxes, cataclysms and wormholes. You have one round in your pistol, so use it wisely over and over again as you kill your past selves, while helping your future self. Do whatever you need to do to escape.

Created as part of Ludum Dare 47: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/paradox
